languages.text: {n}Под обожженной кожей скопился буро-желтый гной. Значит, его раны уже затронула гниль нижних палуб, и даже если организм выдержит путь до медотсека, парень погибнет от болевого шока или заражения крови.{/n}

{n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под обожженной кожей скопился буро-желтый гной. Значит, его раны уже затронула гниль нижних палуб, и даже если организм выдержит путь до медотсека, парень погибнет от болевого шока или заражения крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body lasts until he is brought to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

{n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous sa peau calcinée se sont formés des abcès remplis de pus jaunâtre, signe que ses blessures ont été infectées par la pourriture des ponts inférieurs. Si son corps survit au transport, ce qui serait un miracle en soi, l'homme finira quand même par mourir d'un choc septique ou d'une infection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous sa peau calcinée se sont formés des abcès remplis de pus jaunâtre, signe que ses blessures ont été infectées par la pourriture des ponts inférieurs. Si son corps survit au transport, ce qui serait un miracle en soi, l'homme finira quand même par mourir d'un choc septique ou d'une infection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un pus pardo y amarillento se ha acumulado bajo la piel quemada. Sus heridas ya están manchadas por la podredumbre de las cubiertas inferiores. Aunque sobreviva hasta la instalación medicae, morirá por el shock o la infección.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un pus pardo y amarillento se ha acumulado bajo la piel quemada. Sus heridas ya están manchadas por la podredumbre de las cubiertas inferiores. Aunque sobreviva hasta la instalación medicae, morirá por el shock o la infección.{/n}

languages.text: {n}焦げた皮膚の下には茶色混じりの黄色い膿が溜まっている。男の傷はすでに下層デッキの腐敗に触れており、たとえ男の体が医療施設に運ばれて生き延びたとしても、ショック死か感染症で死ぬだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}焦げた皮膚の下には茶色混じりの黄色い膿が溜まっている。男の傷はすでに下層デッキの腐敗に触れており、たとえ男の体が医療施設に運ばれて生き延びたとしても、ショック死か感染症で死ぬだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他烧焦的皮肤下面积聚着棕黄色的脓液，伤口也被底层甲板腐烂的东西触碰过。就算他能活着撑到医疗甲板，也必定会死于休克或感染。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他烧焦的皮肤下面积聚着棕黄色的脓液，伤口也被底层甲板腐烂的东西触碰过。就算他能活着撑到医疗甲板，也必定会死于休克或感染。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Braungelber Eiter hat sich unter seiner verbrannten Haut angesammelt. Seine Wunden wurden bereits von der Fäulnis der unteren Decks erfasst, und selbst wenn sein Körper den Transport in die Medicae-Anlage übersteht, wird der Mann dennoch sterben – am Schock oder durch die Infektionen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Braungelber Eiter hat sich unter seiner verbrannten Haut angesammelt. Seine Wunden wurden bereits von der Fäulnis der unteren Decks erfasst, und selbst wenn sein Körper den Transport in die Medicae-Anlage übersteht, wird der Mann dennoch sterben – am Schock oder durch die Infektionen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavrulmuş cildinin altında kahverengimsi sarı renkte irin toplanmış. Alt güvertenin çürüğü, çoktan yaralarına yuva yapmış. Sıhhiye tesisine sağ götürülebilse de şoktan veya enfeksiyondan öleceği aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brownish-yellow pus has collected under his scorched skin. His wounds have already been touched by the rot of the lower decks, and even if his body survives transport to the medicae facility, the man will still die of either shock or infection.{/n}
